about_the_game:
Unlock the Founders Pack content for your Core, including:

- 1 Core skin
- 1 Armure skin
- 1 Light effect
- 1 Banner background
- 1 Banner symbol
- 1 Title
- 1 Season pass token granting access to the season pass of your choice

This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K, AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960, AMD R9 280 DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700, AMD Ryzen 7 3700x or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080, AMD Radeon RX 6650 XT or equivalent GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Get access to an exclusive Core appearance, banner background and symbol, a title, and one season pass token with the Founders Pack. This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena.
